page.title: 19Farming
page.content: Farming in this area is mainly arable,that is crops and animals such as pigs,sheep and cows.Nearly all farms use tractors and combine harvesters.A lot of the farms in our area only very small.(e.g.10 cows and a few sheep and will probably have a harvest of hay every year.)There are a few farms that are quite profitable.There are many farms in our block,many next to each other. At Pednor Vale Farm at the bottom of Westdean Lane,the farmer,Bill Dell has about 20 cows and a 35 year old Fordson tractor.Every year he has a small harvest of hay.He rents out his yard to 2 people who between them own 4 traction engines.His farm is very small with no machinery except his tractor.
